title: Stir Fried Prawns with Salted Egg Yolks
ingredients: ['6 extra-large frozen prawns, thawed, shelled, deveined and patted dry', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon ground white pepper', 'cornflour, as needed', '15g butter', '15g butter', '2 tablespoons finely chopped garlic', '2 cooked salted eggs, whites discarded and yolks mashed', '1 tablespoons finely chopped spring onions']
